ingredients.item: ½ bunch salad onions, thinly sliced
400g can mixed bean salad, drained and rinsed
4 Waitrose Duchy Organic Wholemeal Pittas, toasted

instructions.step: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a frying pan and fry the carrot, salad onions and chilli powder for 2-3 minutes.
Meanwhile, roughly crush the bean salad with a potato masher. Stir in the carrot mix, breadcrumbs and egg then season well. Shape into 4 burgers and chill for 15 minutes.

Heat the remaining oil in a frying pan and fry the burgers for 3 minutes each side until golden. Slit open the pittas and place a burger inside each. Add a spoonful of tzatziki and serve with rocket leaves or a green salad.
